headline: Capital One (COF) Upside Persists Despite Regulatory Risks
summary: Capital One Financial Corporation (NYSE:COF) ranks among the best financial stocks to buy according to billionaire Israel Englander. On January 12, JPMorgan analyst Richard Shane boosted Capital One Financial Corporation (NYSE:COF)’s price target to $256 from $237 while maintaining a Neutral rating on the company’s shares. The hike comes after President Trump’s proposal directing issuers […]
